name: What is a Cloud Engineer
description: Learn about the cloud engineer role, what they do day-to-day, and how to become one.

learning_steps.text: Watch: What is a Cloud Engineer
learning_steps.title: What is a Cloud Engineer
learning_steps.description: Discover what cloud engineers do, what skills they need, and the path to becoming one.

Cloud engineering requires continuous learning and problem-solving. Consider: Do you enjoy figuring out how things work? Are you comfortable with change? Can you commit to learning new technologies regularly?

questions.prompt: Describe what a cloud engineer does day-to-day and the typical responsibilities of the role.
scenario_seeds: A friend considering a career change asks what you actually do at work every day
Your manager asks you to write a job description for a junior cloud engineer position
A college student shadowing you wants to understand the variety of tasks in this role
questions.grading_rubric: Must describe at least 4 core responsibilities (infrastructure management, deployment, monitoring, troubleshooting, automation, security) AND explain how cloud engineers collaborate with other teams AND mention the balance between building and maintaining systems.

questions.prompt: What technical skills would you prioritize when building toward a cloud engineering career?
scenario_seeds: Someone with no tech background asks what they should learn first to become a cloud engineer
A bootcamp graduate wants to know which skills will make them most hireable
Your company is creating a training program and asks what foundational skills to include
questions.grading_rubric: Must identify at least 5 core technical skills AND explain why each matters for cloud engineering AND suggest a logical order or priority for learning them.

test_knowledge_prompts: Can you ask me what a cloud engineer does day-to-day?
Can you quiz me on the skills needed to become a cloud engineer?
Can you ask me why I want to become a cloud engineer?
